data.name: NoProjectSelected
data.value: No project is selected for this operation.

data.name: NoSupportedProjectsInSolution
data.value: No projects supported by NuGet in the solution.

data.name: NuGetStaticResult_DisplayText
data.value: Search Online for NuGet Packages matching '{0}'

data.name: SolutionIsNotSaved
data.value: Solution is not saved. Please save your solution before managing NuGet packages.

data.name: ProjectMigrateErrorMessage
data.value: Project is not eligible for migration. Either the project is not packages.config based or doesn't support PackageReference yet.

data.name: ProjectJsonMigrateErrorMessage
data.value: Project is not eligible for migration. Either the project is not packages.config based or doesn't support PackageReference yet. Visit https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/reference/migrate-packages-config-to-package-reference for more information.

data.name: PackageRestoreConsent
data.value: Allow NuGet to download missing packages

data.name: packageRestoreAutomatic
data.value: Automatically check for missing packages during build in Visual Studio

data.name: showPackageManagementChooser
data.value: Prompt for format selection on first package install

data.name: SettingsStoredInNuGetConfiguration
data.value: These settings are stored in %NuGet.Config% files
data.comment: Do not translate % % or what is between them

data.name: Text_ConfigurationFiles_Priority
data.value: Configuration files are listed in order from highest to lowest priority.

data.name: Text_ConfigurationFiles_CommonLink
data.comment: Please leave the [ and ] brackets in place and do translate the words between them. Do not translate the URL inside ( ).

data.name: Text_HttpSource_Warning
data.value: HTTP sources are insecure. Consider using HTTPS instead. 'AllowInsecureConnections' is enabled, permitting HTTP access. For more secure options, see [https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere](https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere).

data.name: Error_PackageSourceUriHostname_Missing
data.value: A hostname must be provided after '://'.

data.name: Text_HttpSource_Error
data.value: NuGet requires HTTPS sources. To use an HTTP source, you must explicitly set 'allowInsecureConnections' to true in your NuGet.Config file. Refer to [https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere](https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere) for more information.

data.name: Text_Watermark_ExamplePackageIdPattern
data.comment: "Contoso.Contracts" and "System.*" are examples of a package ID pattern and a package prefix pattern, respectively, so these two specific examples should not be translated.

data.name: Error_PackageSourceMappingPattern_Missing
data.value: A package pattern must be provided.

data.name: Error_PackageSourceMappingSource_Missing
data.value: At least one source must be selected.

data.name: Text_PackageSources_Description
data.value: Package sources define where NuGet retrieves packages for install, restore, audit, and update operations. [Learn more about package sources](https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/nuget-config-file#packagesources)

data.name: Text_AuditSources_HowToRemove
data.value: Remove all audit sources to revert to using package sources for vulnerability data.

data.name: Text_AuditSources_Description
data.value: Audit sources provide vulnerability data during restore without acting as package sources. If no audit sources are configured, NuGet Audit uses package sources. [Learn more about audit sources](https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/nuget-config-file#auditsources)

data.name: Text_AuditSources_Checkbox
data.value: Use separate sources for vulnerability audit

data.name: Text_MachineWidePackageSource_Description
data.value: Machineâ€‘wide package sources are provisioned by Visual Studio workloads and can only be enabled or disabled.

data.name: Error_CopilotNotReady
data.value: GitHub Copilot is not ready. Please ensure GitHub Copilot is installed and signed in.
data.comment: Do not translate GitHub or Copilot

data.name: Error_ServiceBrokerNotAvailable
data.value: Service Broker is not available. Please ensure Visual Studio is running correctly.

data.name: Error_CopilotServiceNotAvailable
data.value: GitHub Copilot Service is not available. Please ensure GitHub Copilot is installed and signed in.
data.comment: Do not translate GitHub or Copilot

data.name: Error_McpToolServiceNotAvailable
data.value: MCP Tool Service is not available. Please ensure GitHub Copilot is installed and signed in.
data.comment: Do not translate GitHub or Copilot

data.name: Error_CopilotAccessDenied
data.value: Access denied. Please ensure you are signed in to GitHub Copilot.
data.comment: Do not translate GitHub or Copilot
